class.name: TokenTransferSubscription
class.brief_description: A subscription for token transfer events.
class.description: This class is used to subscribe to token transfer events. It allows filtering by contract address, account address (sender or recipient), and token ID.

members.member: An array of account addresses (sender or recipient) to filter by.
An array of contract addresses to filter by.
An array of token IDs to filter by.
The type of the subscription, which is [code]DojoSubscription.TOKEN_TRANSFER[/code].
